subject: ideas
author: Steven Edwards
full_text:
hello all... i am looking for a few ideas to try.. a few ppl from my 
group will be staying at the labahia in goliad pretty soon.. i have 
stayed 5 or 6 times already and never have got good proof of any 
thing.. i have seen alot and heard things there.. even got cold gust of 
wind rush thru the room.. but never get great evp's or great videos.. i 
do get nice orbs on a digital camera.. so if any 1 has any ideas for me 
and the group to try i would appreciate it greatly..


                                               Thanks, Steven
